content: crochet adult shorts by jess h yarn 400 yards of any worsted weight yarn i used 2 skeins of ice yarns favorite ethnic in turquoise fuchsia orange lilac green white 5 yards of any white worsted weight yarn for the ties also needed 1 yard of ½ elastic for waist which you can get at craft stores usually near where they sell the ribbon you could also crochet a cord and tie to desired tightness but this is much less comfortable hook j hook 6 mm but you should do a gauge swatch to check sizing since these are a garment i am a tight crocheter swatch 4 inch square is 17 row and 17
